Video watched. FRONTAL VIDEO or PROFILE: Video watched. 1 = front, 2 = profile
Lineup viewed. Front TA, Front TP, Right TA, Right TP, Front and Right TA, Front and Right TP.
Lineup viewed. 1 = front, 2 = profile, 3 = front + profile.
Combined condition coded. Encoding and test views. 1 = same, 2 = different, 3 = same + different

Condition coded. Video watched and lineup viewed. 1= front video, front lineup; 2 = front video, right lineup; 3 = front video, front + right lineup; 4 = right video, right lineup; 5 = right video, front lineup; 6 = right video, front + right lineup
Lineup: Image presented first. The number indicates which foil face was presented;  "perp" indicates that the face is the perpetrator from the mock-crime video.
Lineup: Image presented second. The number indicates which foil face was presented;  "perp" indicates that the face is the perpetrator from the mock-crime video.

Lineup: Image presented eigth. The number indicates which foil face was presented;  "perp" indicates that the face is the perpetrator from the mock-crime video.

Identification response: Subjects made an identification decision by selecting a number (1-9), or indicating that the perpetrator was “Not Present.”
Lineup condition viewed. Target Absent or Target Present
Lineup condition viewed. 0 = Target Absent, 1 = Target Present
Identification response coded: 0 = Target Absent, 1 = Target Present
Identification response coded: 1 = perp, 2 = filler, 3 = "not Present"
Identification response accuracy coded: 0 = Incorrect, 1 = Correct
Confidence in identification decision: "Please rate your confidence in your decision." Response on an 11-point Likert-type scale ranging from 0% (not at all sure) to 100% (completely certain).
Subject self-reported age.
Subject self-reported sex.
Subject self-reported ethnicity.
Subject response video technical issue question
Subject response lineup technical issue question
Subject responses to anagram filler task (anagrams 1-16)
Technical issues coded. YES = the participant reported a technical issue viewing the video or lineup
Include in final sample coded. 0 = remove from data analyses. 1 = include in data analyses.
